div.script:
var CciFrameworkUrl = "//framework.cox.com/presentation/rest/3.0/locations/cities/"; var CciUserInfoUrl = "https://www.cox.com/webapi/aem/headerprofile?webp=false"; var CciAutoCompleteUrl = ""; var CciConfirmAddressUrl = "https://www.cox.com/webapi/aem/confirmaddress"; var CciFrameworkStrings = {"login":{"2-4":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","2-3":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","2-2":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","2-1":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","2-0":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","3-0":"Too many invalid logins have been attempted. Please try again in 30 minutes.","1-0":"We're currently having trouble verifying your Sign-In. Please try again later.","5-0":"We're currently having trouble verifying your Sign-In. Please try again later.","15098759-0":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","75196832-0":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again.","2-":"An invalid User ID or Password was entered. Please try again."},"signinOpen":"false","locationType":{"invalid":" Uh Oh. This isn't a valid Zip Code. Please try again. 

","outOfMarket":" Hello we do not offer service in your zip code: {zipcode}

To find a new provider, please visit smartmove.us or call 1-866-408-1734.

","cbOnlyMarket":" Hello, we only offer Business services in this zip code: {zipcode}

To find a new provider, for Residential Services, please visit smartmove.us or call 1-866-408-1734.

","tgl-outOfMarket":" Sorry! Cox does not offer service at this address. Did we get your address right?

","errorScenario":" Let us know the location you'd like to browse.

"},"updateAddressMsgs":{"genericMsg":" Welcome! In order to provide you with the most accurate offers and promotions, enter the address you’re shopping for.

","nonServiceable":" We're sorry, Cox does not offer service in your location. {nonServiceableAddress} Change Location

  ","over200":" Help us out... The address you entered returned over 200 matches. To narrow your search, enter your apartment number.

","under200":" Help us out... The address you entered returned {noOfaddressMatched} matches. Please select your address from the list below.

Address not listed? Enter your address

","activeAddress":" Welcome! It looks like service is already active at:

{activeAddress} Change Location

This is my current service address

Sign in I'd like to set up service at this address

Continue to Shop "}};

input.name: gl
input.p: Let us know the location you'd like to browse.

div.p: Already a Cox Residential customer? Sign in
Looking for Business service? Go to Cox Business

input.name: username
input.title: User ID
input.p: No Account? Register Now! Forgot User ID / Password? Need Help Signing In?

a.title: explore internet features
a.span: Discover Internet features, tips and basic instructions

a.title: panoramic wifi
a.span: Whole home WiFi coverage, fast speed and control

a.title: low cost internet for those who qualify
a.span: Low cost internet for those who qualify

a.title: contour tv
a.span: Full TV experience: live & On Demand, voice remote, streaming apps and more!

a.title: channel packages
a.span: NFL RedZone, MLB Extra Innings, Latino, Movies and more!

a.title: contour stream player
a.span: Full streaming experience: On Demand, voice remote, streaming apps, music and more!

a.title: smart home and security plans
a.span: Smart home automation and monitored security solutions

a.title: explore homelife features
a.span: Discover security and automation features, tips and basic instructions

a.title: home phone
a.span: Unlimited calling in the US, Canada and Mexico

a.title: international calling
a.span: Discounted per-minute rates on international calls

a.title: explore voice features
a.span: Discover home phone features, tips and basic instructions

a.title: profile
a.span: Add users and update your contact preferences

a.title: notification
a.span: View account-related messages including emails & texts

a.title: view bills
a.span: View current & past bills, make payments, and more

a.title: view services
a.span: Check out your services, shop for add-ons, troubleshoot equipment, and get quick access to useful product tools

a.title: learn center
a.span: Discover features, tips and basic how-to's to maximize the enjoyment of your Cox services

img.alt: Contour Stream Player compatible platform logos
Contour Stream Player device and remote

img.p: Stream your favorite apps — no cable commitments necessary.

div.p: Cox uses cookies to improve your experience. To learn more, view our privacy notice.

div.class: alert pl-1 pr-2 alert-dismissible alert-warning ml-alert-warn

div.p: During this time of uncertainty and required in-home learning, Cox is helping get families in need connected to the internet through our Connect2Compete program.
For new customers who sign-up between March 13 and May 15, 2020 we are providing:

ul.li: Free Connect2Compete service until July 15, 2020, $9.95/month thereafter
Free phone and remote desktop support through Cox Complete Care until July 15, 2020 to provide peace of mind and ease for technology needs
Resources for discounted, refurbished equipment through our association with PCs for People

A Learn from Home toolkit for schools, including instructions on how to fast-track eligible students without internet access:
Download toolkit - English
Download toolkit - Spanish

span.i: Offer expires 5/15/2020 (C2C application must be received by 11:59pm ET). Cox Complete Care in-home support excluded. Program eligibility and other restrictions apply. Learn more at www.cox.com/c2c.

div.p: To Qualify: You must not be an existing Cox internet customer, your household must have at least one K-12 student and participate in the National School Lunch Program, SNAP, and/or TANF; who receive Tenant-Based Vouchers, Project-Based Vouchers or Section 8 Project-Based Rental Assistance (PBRA); and/or who live in Public Housing

To Qualify: Families with K-12 children who are eligible for the National School Lunch Program, SNAP, and/or TANF; who receive Tenant-Based Vouchers, Project-Based Vouchers or Section 8 Project-Based Rental Assistance (PBRA); and/or who live in Public Housing
Don’t qualify but still need to stay connected? See our other Internet plans with special promotional rates as part of our COVID-19 response:

div.script: if (typeof utag_data !== 'undefined' && utag_data && utag_data.visitorType && typeof newrelic !== 'undefined') { newrelic.setCustomAttribute('visitorType', utag_data.visitorType);}
